StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Discovery Phase - Alzheimer’s Disease Sequencing Project (ADSP)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: INSTRUCTIONS: This study has not provided a suggested acknowledgement statement. However, Approved Users are expected to acknowledge the Submitting Investigator(s) who submitted data from the original study to an NIH-designated data repository, the primary funding organization that supported the Submitting Investigator(s), and the NIH-designated data repository (e.g., dbGaP). The acknowledgment statement should include the dbGaP accession number to the specific version of the dataset(s) analyzed.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Alzheimer Disease, IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ALZ-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Alzheimer Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Neurodegenerative Disease, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ND-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Neurodegenerative Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area
ConsentGroup.name: EA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by ADSP study investigators only.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Alzheimer Disease, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ALZ-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Alzheimer Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Neurodegenerative Disease, IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ND-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Neurodegenerative Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
